outputs.output_descr:
Under the over all supervision of the Co-Chairs of the Steering Committee and the direct supervision of the ERSG, the Steering Committee Support Secretariat shall be responsible for, inter alia:

1.0 Providing secretariat support to the Steering Committee and the technical committee. 
2.0 Periodically reviewing the Rules of Procedure of the Steering Committee and, in consultation with the Co-Chairs, recommend changes or revisions to the Steering Committee.
3.0 Participating in the review and analysis of project proposals received for funding from eligible organisations.
4.0 Ensuring inter-project consistency and providing guidance to participating organisations on common methodology for programme/project costing, staffing and related issues. 
5.0 Calling and organising meetings of the Steering Committee and the technical committee/s/
6.0 Developing and circulating meeting agendas and minutes.
7.0 Collect data for progress reports and impact assessment reports the evaluations of project implementation. 
8. 0 Documenting, communicating and ensuring follow-up of the Steering Committee's decisions particularly ensuring submission of appropriately signed and complete documentation on approved projects to the UNDP Multi-Donor Trust Fund Office in New York.
